note: Supercell's games are all Free-to-Play, rely heavily on in-app purchases (ranging from $0.99 to $99.99), and feature social/multiplayer interaction, which is a common focus for their parental safety guides.

gamekit_integration.leaderboards: Yes (Features extensive in-game leaderboards and integrates with Apple Game Center)
gamekit_integration.achievements: Yes (Integrated with Apple Game Center Achievements)

content_description.violence: Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence (Battles are depicted with cartoon troops, explosions, and fantasy weapons. There is no blood or gore.)
content_description.other_content_warnings: Infrequent/Mild Profanity or Crude Humor (through user-generated content in clan chat), Unrestricted Web Access (via links to support/social media), and Gambling elements (via chests or 'random rewards').

gamekit_integration.achievements: Yes (Integrated with Apple Game Center Achievements)
